TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit DesignerActionPropertyItem extends System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionItem
Public NotInheritable Class DesignerActionPropertyItem Inherits DesignerActionItem

summary.span: 表示与从 派生的类中的属性相关的面板项。

span.span: Represents a panel item that is associated with a property in a class derived from .
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类表示智能标记面板中的各个项。The class represents individual items in a smart tag panel. 每一项通常与类中的一个属性相关联，该类派生自 类并由组件作者提供。Each item is typically associated with a property in a class that is derived from the class and supplied by the component author. 通过属性的名称来维护关联，如属性中所示 。The association is maintained through the name of the property, as stored in the property. 通过调用类的方法，将各个面板项关联起来以形成面板 。Individual panel items are associated together to form a panel by a call to the method of the class. 若要显示关联属性的值，该属性必须具有 `get` 访问器方法; 若要允许编辑，该属性必须具有 `set` 访问器方法。To display the value of the associated property, that property must have a `get` accessor method; to allow editing, the property must have a `set` accessor method. 面板允许用户直接编辑属性项的方式取决于为关联属性的数据类型提供的支持类型信息。The way in which the panel allows direct editing of a property item by the user depends on the supporting type information present for the data type of the associated property. 下表显示了可能的方案。The following table shows the likely scheme. |属性类型信息Property type information|属性项编辑用户界面 (UI) Property item editing user interface (UI)| |-------------------------------|-------------------------------------------------| |具有关联的类型编辑器 () Has an associated type editor ()|将显示与基础属性关联的类型编辑器，用于编辑属性的值。The type editor associated with the underlying property is displayed for editing the property's value.| |具有与已知类型 (关联的类型转换器 ) Has an associated type converter to a known type ()|将显示已知类型的类型编辑器以编辑属性的值。The type editor for the known type is displayed for editing the property's value. 例如，要使用的类型转换器 可能会显示 。For example, a type converter to will likely display a .| |布尔值Boolean value|使用二进制 UI （如复选标记）显示项。The item is displayed using a binary UI, such as a check mark.| |以上都不是。None of the above.|使用数据类型的方法将项显示为不可编辑的文本字符串 。The item is displayed as a non-editable text string using the data type's method.| 所有基本类型（如 ）和常见 .NET Framework 数据类型（例如） 提供标准类型转换器和编辑器。All fundamental types, such as , and common .NET Framework data types, such as , supply standard type converters and editors. 有关类型转换器的详细信息，请参阅 [如何：实现类型转换器](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/visualstudio/visual-studio-2013/ayybcxe5(v=vs.120)) 或 [通用类型转换](/previous-versions/visualstudio/visual-studio-2013/yy580hbd(v=vs.120))。For more information about type converters, see [How to: Implement a Type Converter](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/visualstudio/visual-studio-2013/ayybcxe5(v=vs.120)) or [Generalized Type Conversion](/previous-versions/visualstudio/visual-studio-2013/yy580hbd(v=vs.120)). 有关类型编辑器的详细信息，请参阅 [如何：实现 UI 类型编辑器](/previous-versions/visualstudio/visual-studio-2013/53c49eck(v=vs.120))。For more information about type editors, see [How to: Implement a UI Type Editor](/previous-versions/visualstudio/visual-studio-2013/53c49eck(v=vs.120)). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建对象的集合 。The following code example demonstrates how to create a collection of objects. 有关实现智能标记的完整示例，请参阅 [如何：将智能标记附加到 Windows 窗体组件](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/visualstudio/visual-studio-2013/ms171830(v=vs.120))。For a full example of implementing smart tags, see [How to: Attach Smart Tags to a Windows Forms Component](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/visualstudio/visual-studio-2013/ms171830(v=vs.120)). [!code-csharp[System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction.AddDesignerActions#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction.AddDesignerActions/CS/designeractions.cs#7)] [!code-vb[System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction.AddDesignerActions#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction.AddDesignerActions/VB/designeractions.vb#7)]

summary.span: 获取与此项关联的属性的名称。

span.span: Gets the name of the property that this item is associated with.

value.span: 一个 ，它包含关联属性的名称。

span.span: A that contains the name of the associated property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性指定派生自类的类中的哪个属性 -项应绑定到。The property specifies which property - in the class derived from the class - the item should be bound to. 当程序员通过用户界面与面板项进行交互 (UI) 时，将设置此关联的属性。When the programmer interacts with the panel item through the user interface (UI), this associated property will be set. 在构造函数中设置。 is set in the constructor. 其值区分大小写。Its value is case-sensitive.

summary.span: 获取或设置将其项供给当前面板的组件。

span.span: Gets or sets a component that contributes its items to the current panel.

value.span: 供给组件，该组件应具有提供 对象的关联设计器。

span.span: The contributing component, which should have an associated designer that supplies objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对于 属性，另一个组件可以将其拉取模型面板项借出到当前列表。With the property, another component can lend its pull-model panel items to the current list. 例如，用户控件可能会聚合 其一个或多个构成控件中的对象。For example, a user control might aggregate the objects from one or more of its constituent controls. 此属性与属性结合使用 。This property works in conjunction with the property.
